interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/08/17
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Deutsch [UT]', 'Español (Latinoamérica) [CC]', 'Español (España) [CC]', 'Français [CC]', 'Italiano [CC]', 'Português [SDH]'], 'Directors': ['Frida Barkfors', 'Lasse Barkfors'], 'Producers': ['Frida Barkfors', 'Anders Bruus', 'Anne Köhncke'], 'Studio': ['Journeyman Pictures']}
Review Text: So yeah, this is depressing. But it's objectively a good documentary. The white dude in the beginning definitely should have done *some* time. That's just blatent negligence. Talk about white privilege. (I'm white).
Review Title: Good documentary, but sad
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
